ComicInfo.Title: Growing Pains
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Illegitimates strike out on their first mission as a team! Dannikor's plan revealed! Mom's in peril! And, WHO is the mole in the OLYMPUS organization? Spy-jinks galore as things get messy!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Kevin Sharpe (a) & Peter Pantazis (c) | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Jerry Ordway | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 16:21:05. [CVDB444561]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jerry Ordway, Kevin Sharpe, Peter Pantazis
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Lordsley, Kiken, Leandros, Saalinge, Viktor Dannikor, Vin Darlington
